verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> [Tmiz-MorA Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- long אָ֣נָה <S%H575><s%> 'A-nah How יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Jehovah תִּשְׁכָּחֵ֣נִי <S%H7911><s%> tish-ka-Che-ni How long wilt thou forget נֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> Ne-tzach; alway עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- long אָ֓נָה׀ <S%H575><s%> 'A-nah How תַּסְתִּ֖יר <S%H5641><s%> tas-Tir hide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha thy face מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni. at

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- long אָ֨נָה <S%H575><s%> 'A-nah How אָשִׁ֪ית <S%H7896><s%> 'a-Shit How long shall I take עֵצ֡וֹת <S%H6098><s%> e-Tzot counsel בְּנַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> be-naf-Shi, in my soul יָג֣וֹן <S%H3015><s%> ya-Gon [having] sorrow בִּלְבָבִ֣י <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-Vi in my heart יוֹמָ֑ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam; daily עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- long אָ֓נָה׀ <S%H575><s%> 'A-nah How יָר֖וּם <S%H7311><s%> ya-Rum be exalted אֹיְבִ֣י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vi enemy עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. over

הַבִּ֣יטָֽה <S%H5027><s%> hab-Bi-tah Consider עֲ֭נֵנִי <S%H6030><s%> 'A-ne-ni [and] hear יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai; my God הָאִ֥ירָה <S%H215><s%> ha-'I-rah lighten עֵ֝ינַ֗י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai, mine eyes פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- or אִישַׁ֥ן <S%H3462><s%> 'i-Shan lest I sleep הַמָּֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> ham-Ma-vet. the [sleep of] death

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- lest יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> yo-Mar say אֹיְבִ֣י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vi Lest mine enemy יְכָלְתִּ֑יו <S%H3201><s%> ye-chal-Tiv; I have prevailed צָרַ֥י <S%H6862><s%> tza-Rai against him [and] those that trouble יָ֝גִ֗ילוּ <S%H1523><s%> ya-Gi-lu, me rejoice כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki when אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> em-Mot. when I am moved

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni in בְּחַסְדְּךָ֣ <S%H2617><s%> be-chas-de-Cha in thy mercy בָטַחְתִּי֮ <S%H982><s%> va-tach-Ti But I have trusted יָ֤גֵ֥ל <S%H1523><s%> ya-Gel shall rejoice לִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi, my heart בִּֽישׁוּעָ֫תֶ֥ךָ <S%H3444><s%> bi-shu-'A-Te-cha in thy salvation

אָשִׁ֥ירָה <S%H7891><s%> 'a-Shi-rah I will sing לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because גָמַ֣ל <S%H1580><s%> ga-Mal because he hath dealt bountifully עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. the chief
